data.text: @Detox Thank you Ignacio, we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there.
@lmagova LuisMa, we are sorry we can not tell you something different. We can not track the luggage with a PIR from another company.

@SangeetaNathu Hola Sangeeta, sorry for the inconvenience. The priority boarding is only for passengers with infants (up to 2 years old), unfortunately. Also, notice that other passengers might have priority boarding based on their frequent flyer status or ticket fare. Kind regards

@PanAfrikFem_PhD We're sorry for the inconvenience. If there isn't anybody at your house to receive the bag for you, the courier will take the bag back to the airport and arrange a new delivery on the next few days. Kind regards
@Detox Hola Ignacio, please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with more details about your inquiry. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@lmagova Hola, according to the agreement between airlines, the airline that operates the last flight on the itinerary is the one responsible for the baggage delivery and its claim. We understand that you already opened a PIR with AA, so please contact them for further assistance
@ArtySausage Hola, we'll get back to you via DM as soon as we have an answer from the relevant department. Best regards
@Carol_Paruolo Hola Ana, we have replied your DM. Regards

@sanela_kah Hola Sanela, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number,  registered email and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@albina_oks Hola Albina, we are sorry to read this, we are processing the refund as you requested and accepted under fare conditions, we have also replied your DM. Regards
@ArtySausage Hola Jude, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by dm more details of your inquiry and voucher information ? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Attika2022 You're welcome, we remain at your disposal. Kind regards :)
@AdamHoyes Hola Adam, sorry for the inconvenience. In case you need further information, please contact the cabin crew. Kind regards
@ilavmybffkim Hola Jimmy, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your purchase process in order to help you? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just sent you a DM. Please check
@allbernardo Hola Antonio, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM about this situation? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@anasabadelle1 Hola Ana, we have sent you a response in our direct message conversation with more information about your case. Regards.
@ManiacMcCormill Hello, we replied to you again in our conversation by DM. Regards.
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, we have sent you a response to our conversation via direct message. Regards.
@BikeandBusLanes Hola, please send us more details about your query via DM, and we will verify all the information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@ralphie440DOM Hello Rafael. We have answered your direct message. 
Regards,
@evgenyboychuk Hola Evgeny. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa ? Thank you and kind Regards,
@HarjitLota Hola Harjit, we've just replied your DM. Best regards
@leon15_monica The bag is only considered lost after 21 days of searches. The update will be sent via SMS or email directly from the baggage center. Best regards
@Anella_B We've replied your DMs. Since the PIR was opened by Vueling, they are the only ones that will be able to assist you. So please contact Vueling

data.text: @Anella_B Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference number and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@zandreeuh Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Janet03343339 Sure, Janet. Please send us a DM with your email address https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@cheunghk5 Hola Cheung, sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. Once our baggage center has an update about the bag's location and its delivery, you'll be contacted by SMS or email. Best regards
@CaroBittar Carolina, lamentamos no poder indicarte algo diferente desde redes a lo mencionado en nuestro mensaje previo.
@Atpreis22 Hola Adam, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact our colleagues at the airport or reach British Airways for further assistance, since they issued your ticket. Apologies

data.text: @leeinengland Hola Lee, we've replied your DM. Best regards
@leeinengland Hola Lee , we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@Hi_Preis Please ask the passenger to contact our colleagues at the airport or reach BA to check if they are able to relocate him on a different flight. Sorry for the inconvenience

@quinn_CA_to_UK We are sorry to read this Quinn, could you please give us by DM all details of your inquiry including flight dates, origin and destiny and if you have tried through the App? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@Hi_Preis Hola, we're sorry to read this. If he bought the ticket from British Airways, please ask him to contact BA for further assistance. Best regards

data.text: @lucavincenzo Hola Luca. We've just replied your DMs. Please check and provide the required details
@AdamHoyes Hola Adam, sorry for the inconvenience. We'll take your comments in consideration in order to improve the quality of our website. We remain at your disposal. Kind regards
@leon15_monica Sorry, Monica. We kindly ask you to please wait for an update from the baggage center. Best regards
@Rubyroo67 You're welcome :)
@kthshome_ Hola, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
@albina_oks Hola Albina, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
@Marxs_carpark Hola Trev, we have escalated your case and our colleagues are working on your case, as soon as they give us an update, we'll contact you back with details. Kind regards
@leon15_monica Hola Monica, we are sorry to read this, as soon as our colleagues have an update , they will contact you directly by sms or email. We appreciate your patience. Kind regards
@2onions1aloo Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your claim case number and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@pampjpj Hola Pam, we are sorry to read this, we have replied all details with the owner of the PIR. Regards
@AnaMerinoPoeta Ana, hemos solicitado detalles del PIR, dado en el aeropuerto para poder comprobar. Seguimos pendiente por DM. Saludos
@Rubyroo67 Hola Sam, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, hemos dado respuesta a tus DM solicitando datos. Saludos
@Alberto_Vietnam Alberto, estamos ya con la revisión de tu expendiente. Te decimos algo en cuánto tengamos novedades. Gracias

📢 Good news: this winter we are bringing back Rio de Janeiro and Caracas, and also Dallas. We are maintaining the route to Funchal and we are strengthening our operations with Barcelona, Bilbao, the Canary and Balearic Islands, among many other new features.
Check out 👇

data.text: @0xKaren Thank you Karen :)
@lmagova Hola Luis, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you.
@chriscomparetto https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@chriscomparetto We don´t have any DM, please follow this link and tell us the details, Thank you.
@cervantesrubi ¿Nos podrías enviar por favor tu PIR o número de reporte, tus datos de contacto y nombre completo por MD? Gracias. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, hemos respondido tu otro comentario, aguardamos tu md

@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, lamentamos tu maleta esta demorada, ¿que aerolínea fue la última que operó tu viaje?, ¿nos das más información en un MD?. Así podremos asistirte en lo que necesites. Saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@cr12356789 Hola Joan, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@0xKaren Hola, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@chriscomparetto Do you mean the booking code? Please let us know what is the number that you need by DM. Thank you.
@chriscomparetto Hola Chris, you should have the contact on the documents of your booking, please contact them directly. Regards.
@AllgoodJohnson We have answered to your DM, Michael. Regards
@CaroBittar Hola Carolina, se respondió a tu MD. Saludos

@Janet03343339 Hola Janet. The reimbursement has been processed from our behalf. If you haven't received it, please refer to your bank so that they may provide you with assistance about this matter. Regards
@cristinapretire Hola Cristina, we're sorry to read this. Please delete the PIR reference from your public tweet and send us the details via DM, so we can assist you https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
